Posts.Content: My mom has breast cancer. It has been about a year now. She has already had the lumpectomy. She is doing worse. I read on your site that someone said juicing was good. She is being given a mild form of chemotherapy right now.Some sites say that juicing is good and some say it is bad.What is correct? I would like to get correct information here. My mom is doing everything nutritionally except for the chemotherapy. Please help! Thank you, Jessica
Posts.Title: Please Help...juicing
